title: Bloomberg Markets: IBM Misses as Cloud and Services Unit Falter
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: IBM Misses as Cloud and Services Unit Falter
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anurag Rana Senior Analyst:Software & IT Services Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing IBM missing estimates for quarterly revenue, with a key business unit declining for the second consecutive time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
